column2: Go Potion Shopping
A local alchemist has set up shop in your holding. Pay her a visit and you can buy potions that have various effects.
Temp Potion CD
You should never see this.
Recently Bought Potion
This character has recently bought a potion. The alchemist warns against drinking more than one within a period of two years.
Beautiful
This character is glowing with unnatural beauty and sex appeal.
LF - Potion Shopping

The inside of the shop is extremely cluttered, with potions, alembics, and various other alchemic instruments and creations scattered around. Despite the clutter, it's surprisingly ordered, with everything being where it should.

The resident alchemist is a woman, likely a mage considering her weaving of aetherical energies into her current work, and pays you no mind while she toils away at her project. "If you have any questions, feel free to ask," she speaks, never looking up from her alchemical equipment.

The shelves on the left wall of the shop are stocked labeled with potions for bodily enhancement, the right wall is stocked and labeled with potions for mental enhancement, and the shelf on the wall behind the counter isn't labeled, but it's clear the potions for sale there are of the more... exotic variety.
Potions of Bodily Enhancement
Potions of Mental Enhancement
Exotic Potions
Just browsing today, thank you.
LF - Bodily Enhancement

The shelf is stocked with three varieties of potions:

Potions of Strength, which enhances your martial strength for a time.

Potions of Beauty, to alchemically dissolve any disfigurement that might be seen as unattractive.

Potions of Resist Disease, which grants temporary immunity to most disease outbreaks.
Potion of Strength
This potion enhances your muscles and grants you a temporary boost to physical strength and martial capacity.
Potion of Beauty
This potion will permanently remove one undesirable physical trait from your body at random.
Potion of Resist Disease
This potion creates a temporary vaccine that grants immunity to most disease outbreaks.

This potion creates a temporary vaccine that grants immunity to most disease outbreaks.\nUnemployed mothers named Karen would rather be scammed by oil extract sellers than drink this.\nDon't be like Karen, vaccinate your children.
Let me see your other stock.
LF - Mental Enhancement

The shelf is stocked with three varieties of potions:

Potion of Paranoia, which will overcome the imbiber with extreme paranoia for some time.

Potion of Amnesia, which can wipe away certain mental afflictions.

Potion of Wisdom, which grants a temporary boost to one's mental capacities.
Potion of Paranoia
This potion creates a temporary surge of paranoia in your mind, granting increased assassination defense.
Potion of Amnesia
This potion will randomly remove a negative mental affliction at random. Not completely reliable.
Potion of Wisdom
This potion creates a temporary surge in the brain, allowing for greater learning and diplomacy.
LF - Exotic Potions

The back shelf has three potions for sale:

A potion with swirling ranbow colors.

A dull grey potion.

A potion bottled in gold rather than glass.

The alchemist did not label these potions, and makes no move to explain their contents.
Swirling Potion

The alchemist will not say what this potion does. She only replies with a deep grin when asked. The potion itself seems to change its swirling colors from blue to pink and then back to blue, in a repeating pattern.
Your arcane senses tell you that this potion will change one's sex.
Grey Potion
The alchemist will not say what this potion does. She only replies with a deep grin when asked. The potion itself is a dull grey color, but simply looking at it gives me youthful vigor.
Your arcane senses tell you that this potion will reduce your age by half a decade.
The Potion of Wisdom grants you great insight.\nUnfortunately, the insight is telling you that you should have drunk a Potion of Intelligence instead, you idiot.
Your new-found wisdom grants you great insight.\nInsight says... man who fail to learn history doomed to repeat it. Man who fail to clear history doomed to explain it.
Your new-found wisdom grants you great insight.\nInsight says... man truly never know non-violent solutions until mosquito land on balls.
Your new-found wisdom grants you great insight.\nInsight says... 953,257,668,541 people too lazy to read number.
Your new-found wisdom grants you great insight.\nInsight says... woman laid in tomb may become mummy.
Your new-found wisdom grants you great insight.\nInsight says... man who want pretty nurse must be patient.
Your new-found wisdom grants you great insight.\nInsight says... teacher with crossed eyes cannot control pupils.
Your new-found wisdom grants you great insight.\nInsight says... man who farts in church sits in own pew.
Your new-found wisdom grants you great insight.\nInsight says... house without latrine is uncanny.
Huh. My insight is right.
Potion of Strength
This character is infused with great strength.
Potion of Paranoia
This character is infused with extreme paranoia.
Potion of Wisdom
This character is infused with great insight.
Potion of Resist Disease
This character is infused with great resistance to disease.
